content: building blocks skirt this skirt is for the little girl who loves tights emily dame-gibes toddler skirt fits toddler size 2t 4t - changes for size 4t are in parenthesis skill level intermediate gauge due to the drape of the cotton yarn used in this skirt gauge is unimportant **please note the toddler in the picture is a little smaller than a 2t therefore the fit is slightly inaccurate however this picture gives a view of what this skirt looks like with tights and a onesie underneath ** materials 4 6 oz of worsted weight cotton yarn 18 23 inch piece of 3/8 elastic sewn in a circle size j k l crochet hook size m crochet hook size 4t only stitch marker blunt end needle for sewing in ends foundation with j hook join mc around elastic circle with slip_stitch chain 1 continuing to make stitches around therefore enclosing the elastic circle make 100 154 single_crochet join with slip_stitch to first chain 1 space chain 1 mark with stitch marker - 100 154 single_crochet round 1 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet *chain 1 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet* repeat from * to * to last 2 single_crochet sch 1 skip last single_crochet slip_stitch to beg chain 1 chain 1- 50 77 single_crochet 50 77 chain 1 spaces round 2-12 repeat round 1 omitting chain 1 at end of round 12 round 13 with k hook chain 3 counts as first double_crochet skip 1st single_crochet double_crochet in next chain 1 space *chain 4 skip next 5 sts double_crochet in next 4 sts* repeat from * to * 9 18 times chain 4 skip next 5 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet- 11 20 chain 4 spaces round 14 slip_stitch in same space as joining *chain 2 5 double_crochet in next chain 4 space chain 2 skip next double_crochet sl st in next 2 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 10 19 more times chain 2 skip next double_crochet slip_stitch in next double_crochet sl st to joining slip_stitch- 11 20 shells round 15 slip_stitch in chain 2 space chain 3 double_crochet in same chain 2 space *chain 4 skip next shell 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space skip next slip_stitch 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space* repeat from * to * to last shell chain 4 2 double_crochet in next chain 3 space join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 all sizes repeat rounds 14 and 15 twice more with size k hook repeat rounds 14 and 15 twice more with size l hook size 2t only repeat round 14 once more fasten_off weave in ends size 4t only after repeating round 14 and 15 twice with size l hook repeat rounds 14 and 15 twice more repeat round 14 once more fasten_off weave in ends ©2007 emily dame-gibes all rights reserved
